General FAQ

Here are more general questions and answers. If your question is not answered here, feel free to contact the organisers directly.

Mostly yes! Niantic usually does allow a Mission Day after an Anomaly. We are still in the early stages of planning that, and more information will follow as it becomes available.

We will request the NL-1331 van to be sent to Geneva in-game for the anomaly event. However, the final decision rests with Niantic. We will provide updates as soon as we receive more information from them.

Absolutely! You can buy all the swag you need from our swag shop when it's open. Don't worry, the information will be widely spread when the shop is open. Unfortunately, you have to pick up all the swag in Geneva. If you cannot make it, you can still buy our swag and ask your friends to pick it up for you. There will of course also be some free swag available on the day.

You can absolutely still participate in the event! It is helpful to let us know when you sign up so we can help you find a team which meets your needs. If you have specific questions please reach out to Team Building once you have signed up or email at genfwillbeblue@gmail.com.

Of course! If they want to participate they can either sign up with our registration themselves, or if you are not comfortable with that, you can always tell our Team Building and your Team Lead about it. Please make sure to follow the Ingress Terms and Conditions.

Contact : genfwillbeblue@gmail.com
